Lewis de Granada, Prouinciall of the holy order of preachers, in the prouince of Portugall.

notesStmt.note: A translation of books 1-4 only of: Memorial de la vida Christiana.
The imprint is false; in fact printed in London, possibly by Valentine Simmes--STC.
The last three books were not published in English until 1699.
